section_info.title: Volunteering_XX
section_info.details: _XXVolunteering works and activities done for different organisations.

volunteerings.title: Section Leader - Code in Place (CIP)_XX
volunteerings.summary_text: _XXFacilitated student learning in Python through Stanford's global volunteer-driven Code in Place program · Stanford Online · Apr 2023 - Apr 2024

details.description_full: _XXParticipated as a Section Leader in Stanford’s global volunteer-driven Code in Place program, aimed at democratizing access to computer science education. The initiative involved guiding and supporting a small cohort of learners through Python programming fundamentals as part of Stanford's renowned CS106A course. The program combines human-centered teaching with scalable online learning, recruiting and training volunteer instructors worldwide to create an inclusive and engaging learning environment.

volunteerings.title: Scientific Journal Reviewer_XX
volunteerings.organization: _XXEuropean Alliance of Medical and Biological Engineering and Science (EAMBES)
volunteerings.summary_text: _XXActively involved in peer-review of scientific manuscripts for journals affiliated with EAMBES · European Alliance of Medical and Biological Engineering and Science (EAMBES) · Aug 2023 - Present

details.description_full: _XXContributed to the scientific community by critically reviewing research manuscripts submitted to prestigious journals under the EAMBES umbrella. Key journals include: 1. Biomedical Signal Processing and Control (BSPC) – ISSN: 1746-8094 [link] 2. Computers & Electrical Engineering – ISSN: 0045-7906 [link] Reviews were conducted with an emphasis on scientific merit, originality, and clarity, contributing to the integrity and advancement of biomedical and engineering research.
